## Examples

**Example 1: Enhanced Filtering**
- Feature: Add filter by programming language
- Benefit: Users can quickly find templates in their preferred language
- Use Case: A .NET developer wants to see only .NET-based templates

**Example 2: Template Comparison**
- Feature: Side-by-side comparison of multiple templates
- Benefit: Easier decision-making when choosing between similar templates
- Use Case: Comparing two AI agent templates to select the best fit

**Example 3: Search Improvements**
- Feature: Fuzzy search and tag-based filtering
- Benefit: More accurate and flexible search results
- Use Case: Finding templates using partial or related keywords
